main event: Observer saw what appears to be an aerial explosion 40 miles west of Burns Junction, Nevada.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to the NORAD region combat center,The observer called in the report from the Winnemucca Hotel,The incident occurred around 1920Z on February 21, 1961,Local radio news reported pieces of a meteor falling in Oregon the same night,The report indicates that additional information was requested but not provided.
witness description: Observer was located at the Winnemucca Hotel
